opennlp.ccg.grammar
Class RuleGroup

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.grammar.RuleGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RuleGroup
extends Object
implements Serializable

A set of rules for combining categories. Observed rule combos can be cached, either statically or dynamically. During deserialization, the grammar is set to the current grammar, and supercat rule combos are borrowed from the current grammar's rule group.

Version:
$Revision: 1.32 $, $Date: 2011/06/07 05:12:01 $
Author:
Jason Baldridge, Gann Bierner, Michael White
See Also:

public boolean getDynamicCombos()
Returns the dynamic combos flag.

loadSupercatRuleCombos

public void loadSupercatRuleCombos(URL url)
                            throws IOException
Loads the observed supercat-rule combos, for filtering. Only file URLs are supported at present. Missing files are ignored.

Throws:
IOException

borrowSupercatRuleCombos

public void borrowSupercatRuleCombos(RuleGroup ruleGroup)
Borrows the observed supercat-rule combos from the given rule group.

getTypeChangingRule

public TypeChangingRule getTypeChangingRule(String name)
Returns the type changing rule with the given name, or null if none.

getRulesForPred

public Collection<TypeChangingRule> getRulesForPred(String pred)
Returns the type changing rules indexed by the given lexical predicate. The type changing rules are indexed by their first elementary predication.

getRulesForRel

public Collection<TypeChangingRule> getRulesForRel(String rel)
Returns the type changing rules indexed by the given relation. The type changing rules are indexed by their first elementary predication.

Applies the unary rules to the given input sign, returning the list of results.
